content: © 2022 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful tutorial my life s not a race crochet pattern also uses double_crochet stitches worked between the stitches of the row below so the tutorial video on youtube may be helpful https //www youtube com/watch v=mt6xjggwqkq&t=196s starting each row to start row 2 and every other row chain 3 or use the chainless starting double_crochet technique shown in the photo below this counts as your first stitch of the row here s how to chainless starting double_crochet http //www mooglyblog com/chainless-starting-double-crochet/ then double_crochet into the space between the double_crochet stitches of the row below crochet into the space marked by the gold needle in the photo below you are crocheting into this big space instead of crocheting into the smaller space below the top two loops of each double crochet stitch like you normally would chama valley blanket crochet pattern © 2022 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful double_crochet into the next space between the double_crochet stitches from the row below this space is marked by the gold needle in the photo below continue to double_crochet into each space between stiches of the row below try doing it by feel- find this space with your fingers instead of with your eyes great for crocheting in low light finishing a row crochet into the spaces between the stitches from the row below until you get to the last space this space is a little smaller than the others do not crochet into the last space between stiches of the row below you will skip this space it is marked by the gold needle in the first photo on the left below instead crochet into the top of your first stitch from the previous row this stitch is marked by the gold needle in the photo below on the right this is the top of your chain 3 or csdc that started the previous row √ chama valley blanket crochet pattern © 2022 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful your row is complete having trouble check out tamara kelly s video tutorials on her excellent crochet blog moogly she shows how to hold the yarn and hook how to make a slipknot how to make a chain slip_stitch and how to double crochet http //www mooglyblog com/learn-how-to-crochet/ left-handed video http //www mooglyblog com/how-to-crochet-left-handed/ here s a double_crochet between the stitches photo tutorial by caissa cami mcclinton https //www crochetspot com/how-to-double-crochet-between-stitches/ please feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern as long as you include chama valley camp blanket pattern by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful in your description when listing an item for sale online or on facebook or other social media thank you for not sharing the pattern without attributing susan kennedy as author or using any of the photos or instructions in this pattern as your own thank you for your support chama valley blanket crochet pattern © 2022 by susan kennedy of pretty peaceful
